name: DO-NUT PARTY
description:
PLAYERS PARTICIPATE AT A RACE

Maximum 4 players can play at the same time. If a player want's to play solo, bots will be added. The goal is to get the biggest amount of points before the race finishes.

You get points by: 
-colliding with other players and pudding (green thingy)
-collecting sweets that come from the sky
-being the lap leader (red flag on kart)

You lose points by: 
-being slapped by "The Hand"
-colliding with environment

Race ends when the first player finishes all laps

//CONTROLS//

Player One: A and D

Player Two: LEFT and RIGHT

Player Three: F and H

Player Four: J and L

//INFO//

Game made for JamDNA 7

The whole game was made within the 96 hours of jamDNA.

We made it all by ourselves except for the soundtrack

Song Credits: playonloop.com - CC
